hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Transition Signal via BTC Dominance Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: When the market is in NEUTRAL regime (confidence > 60%) and BTC dominance (BTC.D) experiences a sharp 3-day decline of >2% while BTC price remains within ±3% of its 20-day moving average, a subsequent regime transition to BULL will occur within 5 trading days, with altcoins (SOL, AVAX, GRT) outperforming BTC by >5% over the following 10 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In neutral regimes, sharp declines in BTC dominance without corresponding BTC weakness often signal capital rotation into altcoins, anticipating a bull regime. This pattern preceded the March 2024 and October 2023 bull transitions.

exit_conditions.take_profit: SOL/BTC or AVAX/BTC ratio increases by 8% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC.D rebounds above its 5-day moving average +0.5%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 40% of signals fail to produce a BULL regime transition within 5 days OR altcoin/BTC pairs fail to outperform in 70% of cases.
